name: 2D Platformer Complete (mehtadak)
description:
This is my 2D platformer project. I have implemented some major and some minor changes, Hope you like it !!!

Major changes:

1. Added 2 new engaging levels, one of which (level 3) has a different playstyle compared to the previous ones. 

2. Added a cutscene between levels 2 and 3, which explains the lore behind the change in playstyle. It is made using the animator and timeline tools. 

3. Added a new script that inherits from the pickup script and adds an additional 10 points to the score instead of 1. I added this script to a new sprite (provided in the assets) and made it into a prefab. 

Minor changes:

1. Changed the font of the whole project. 

2. Changed the levels page in the main menu to reflect changes to the levels and added content to the instructions and credits pages.
